Author: DexterPOSH
Summary: I wanted to deploy Server 10 VM joined to my domain and leveraged Azure Automation to do that. So now when I need a new VM, just have to invoke the Runbook and a domain joined new server is ready in well over 10 minutes.I have a blog post explaining how this works too.
Title: New-AzureTestVM - Add a new VM to your Domain on Azure
